definitions: estimated or forecast on the basis of current trends or data

examples.text: projected growth is expected to be 26 percent

shortDefinitions: estimated on basis of current data

examples.text: a projected exhibition of contemporary art
Haydn conceived the symphony for a projected trip to England which fell through

definitions: (of light, shadow, or an image) cast or transmitted on to a surface

examples.text: the show melds projected images and live performance into a seamless whole
a Spanish artist known for his use of glass and projected light

shortDefinitions: (of light or image) cast or transmitted on surface
